channel.title: CVE Feed for deTheme -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for deTheme -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-5418|2024-08-01T21:11:12.717Z -- detheme -- dethemekit%20for%20elementor
item.description: The DethemeKit For Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'slitems' attribute within the plugin's De Product Tab & Slide widget in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-6283|2024-08-01T21:33:05.519Z -- detheme -- dethemekit%20for%20elementor
item.description: The DethemeKit For Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the URL parameter of the De Gallery widget in all versions up to and including 2.1.5 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user-supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user clicks on the injected link.

item.title: CVE-2024-6283|2024-06-27T18:14:54.867Z -- detheme -- dethemekit%20for%20elementor
item.description: The DethemeKit For Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the URL parameter of the De Gallery widget in all versions up to and including 2.1.5 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user-supplied attributes. item.description: The DethemeKit For Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'slitems' attribute within the plugin's De Product Tab & Slide widget in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. item.title: CVE-2024-4374|2024-06-04T17:54:55.971Z -- detheme -- dethemekit%20for%20elementor
item.description: The DethemeKit For Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's widgets in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-32508|2024-04-17T09:53:06.098Z -- detheme -- dethemekit%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in deTheme DethemeKit For Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects DethemeKit For Elementor: from n/a through 2.0.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-34575|2024-06-04T17:42:10.453Z -- detheme -- dethemekit%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in deTheme DethemeKit For Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects DethemeKit For Elementor: from n/a through 2.1.2.
